name: SCHOGINI Systems Pvt Ltd
description:
Schogini Systems Pvt Ltd is a product R&D company that designs, creates and delivers e-Commerce modules and intelligent gaming & other mobile apps. Schogini has a unique team with one of the first Magento Certified Developer+ and Zend PHP5 Certified Engineer. Schogini is ISO 9001:2008 Certified for Software Development and Customer Support.
With 400+ apps in iTunes, Android, Amazon and Windows Hub stores, our expertise ranges from educational apps to business apps and complex augmented reality apps. Our expertise also lies in Physics, 2D and Game Center/Multi-Player based Apps. • With experienced developers across all platforms – iOS, Android, Windows and Blackberry, we are able to create innovative mobile apps quickly. • We have a unique team of one of the first Magento Certified Developer + and Zend PHP5 Certified engineer. Our PHP expertise has made it an exclusive payment gateway integrator for Magento, Prestashop and Opencart ecommerce platforms. • We have a dedicated Content team to research on the syllabus and contents taught to children of various age groups across the globe and we try to match the features in our apps. • Highly qualified Creative team to give our app the Midas touch with striking colors, cute characters and creative interactions.
